description: Installation of 102 solar PV panels on the flat roof of the fly tower of the Hackney Empire [associated with Full Planning Permission 2022/3048].
decision_conditions: <p>All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external, shall be finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, and in the case of brickwork, facebond and pointing.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building.</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.
